DOC.brief_summary: This study investigate potential association two preloads offer snack postprandial glycemic response , subjective objective appetite energy intake healthy , normal-weight adult .
DOC.brief_title: Short-term Effects Carob Snack Postprandial Glycemic Responses Energy Intake Satiety
DOC.detailed_description: This study aim 1. firstly determine glycemic index ( GI ) carob snack compare isoenergetic , equal weight chocolate cookie 2. test hypothesis carob preload consume snack meal , compare chocolate cookie would : ( ) great short-term effect satiety measure subsequent ad libitum meal intake , ( b ) induce great satiety assess visual analogue scale ( VAS ) , ( c ) reduce postprandial glycemic response .
DOC.criteria: Healthy , nonsmoking , nondiabetic men woman individual normal body mass index ( BMI ; 18.5 24.9 kg/m2 ) Severe chronic disease ( e.g . tumor , manifest coronary heart disease , diabetes mellitus , severe kidney liver condition , endocrine immunological condition ) Gastrointestinal disorder ( e.g . chronic inflammatory bowel disease ) Lactose intolerance Pregnancy Competitive sport Lactation Alcohol Drug dependency
